mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STAR_CARD (card_name, card_number, pin_number) VALUES (#{cardName}, #{cardNumber}, #{pinNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT bin_to_uuid(card_id,1) as card_id, card_name, card_nickname, card_number, status, pin_number, card_amount, created_at, updated_at FROM STAR_CARD WHERE card_id = uuid_to_bin(#{cardId},1)
